text: "Levon" is a 1971 song by Elton John and is taken from his fourth studio album Madman Across the Water. It went to number 6 in Canada and number 24 in the United States. It did not chart in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Australia and New Zealand. It has been covered by Jon Bon Jovi on the 1991 tribute album. ==References== Category:1971 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Jon Bon Jovi songs
title: Levon (song)
